#summary perfSONAR UI home page

= perfSONAR UI =

== Introduction ==
perfsonarUI is a web application for running and visualizing on-demand tests between perfSONAR measurement points (MPs) or visualizing historical measurement results obtained from perfSONAR measurement archives (MAs). It is designed to be intuitive and user friendly, thus allowing the network operator the troubleshoot network problems as efficiently as possible.

== Installation ==

An installation guide describes the installation of the psUI for RPM based or Debian distribution.  You can [http://downloads.perfsonar.eu/repositories/documents/perfsonarUI_installation_guide.pdf download it here].

== Usage ==

A user guide describing how to use the psUI user interface can be [http://downloads.perfsonar.eu/repositories/documents/perfsonarUI_user_guide_1.4.pdf downloaded here]. This guide covers each feature of the UI:
 * how to select a perfSONAR service
 * how to access historical measurements
 * how to make an on-demand measurement
 * how to troubleshoot a path
 * how to configure the UI
 * how to configure authentication with an indentity provider
